column1:
Agent: ""I can certainly help with that. Was there something wrong with the machine?""

Customer: ""No, it works perfectly fine. My wife just surprised me with the exact same one as a gift, so I don't need two.""

Agent: ""That's a lovely surprise! Not a problem at all. We can process that return for you.""",
column2: The customer returned a product because they received the same item as a gift, and the agent processed the return without issue.
